meta.description: Optimize the production quantities of full-weighted and semi-weighted keyboards to maximize total revenue.

sets.name: KEYBOARDS
sets.description: Types of keyboards produced by the company.

params.name: price
params.description: Selling price of each type of keyboard.

params.name: chip_requirement
params.description: Number of oscillator chips required for each type of keyboard.

params.name: production_time
params.description: Production time required for each type of keyboard in hours.

params.name: total_chips
params.description: Total number of oscillator chips available per day.

params.name: total_hours
params.description: Total working hours available per day.

vars.name: production_qty
vars.description: Number of keyboards to produce for each type.

objective.name: max_total_revenue
objective.description: Maximize the total revenue from selling the keyboards.

constraints.name: chip_constraint
constraints.description: Total oscillator chips used should not exceed available chips.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total production time should not exceed available working hours.
